document.full_text: rovio, the developer of the "angry birds" mobile game eyes an initial public offering in three to four years, its chief marketing officer was quoting as saying in a finnish business daily on monday.
document.title: angry birds developer eyes ipo in 3-4 years: report
lines_and_colors: rovio, the developer of the "angry birds" mobile game eyes an initial public offering in three to four years, its chief marketing officer was quoting as saying in a finnish business daily on monday.
